text: Avrilly is a former commune in the Eure department in Normandy in northern France. On 1 January 2016, it was merged into the new commune of Chambois.Arrêté préfectoral 23 November 2015 ==Population== ==See also== *Communes of the Eure department ==References== Category:Former communes of Eure
title: Avrilly, Eure
